trends: There have been 68 other sightings in Pensacola
There was one other sighting in Pensacola on or around March 17th 2010
Summary: Crazy light display in the sky
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving east bound on hwy 90 when i saw a street light looking light in the sky. I thought it was just a street light on the horizon, but as i came up over the hill i saw the light was high in the sky. As soon as i got a good glimpse of it, the light dissapeared. Then a few seconds later about 5 or 6 more lights appeared forming a widening half circle until they dissapeared as well. My brother said it was c130 flares, but i looked on youtube to see what those looked like, and the lights i saw were MUCH MUCH MUCH bigger and the direction in which the lights i saw resemble nothing of the c130 flare videos i saw.
